thread.title: Owners of Faircloth rubbish landfill seeks expansion
thread.title_full: Owners of Faircloth rubbish landfill seeks expansion - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Owners of Faircloth rubbish landfill seeks expansion
text:
CLINTON, Miss. (AP) - Opposition is expected again to a request to expand the Faircloth rubbish landfill near Clinton.
Hinds County is conducting a public hearing Tuesday on a request to modify the county's local solid waste management plan to allow for expansion of the solid waste landfill by 26.5 acres, essentially doubling its size.
The Clarion-Ledger reports ( http://on.thec-l.com/1QmoUCq ) residents and the owners of the landfill have been at odds for many years over the Class 1 rubbish landfill just south of the Clinton city limits.
In 2012, the Board of Supervisors voted against a conditional use permit to expand the landfill but later approved the request 3-2 after then-Supervisor Kenneth Stokes voted for it. Residents appealed the board's decision and won on a technicality. That led to the process having to start over.
Information from: The Clarion-Ledger, http://www.clarionledger.com
